name: Load_enterprise_Group
action:
<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(SM_Enterprise_Cluster)*>
<*CTX( Container(SM_Enterprise_Cluster).LoadKeys(ListIndex).Load(select <*eval(Replace("'" + Replace("<*VALUE(Enterprise_Groups_list)*>","| ","' as EnterpriseGroup  UNION SELECT '") + "'","#","' as ListIndex,'"))*> as EnterpriseGroup ))*>
